Question: Reeve Carney stars as Spider-this person in the 2010 Broadway musical Spider-this person: Turn Off the Dark.
Hints: Spider-this person is a fictional character, a comic book superhero who appears in comic books published by Marvel Comics.
He continues wearing the costume when he returns from the Secret Wars, starting in The Amazing Spider-this person #252.
